mx-affix.name: Affix
mx-affix.description: Affix component that fixes content to viewport when scrolling.

mx-alert.name: Alert
mx-alert.description: Alert component for displaying important messages.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of alert: success, info, warning, error

properties.name: banner
properties.description: Display as banner (full width, no border)

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<!-- Success alert -->
<mx-alert type="success" message="Success Text"></mx-alert>

<!-- With description -->
<mx-alert
  type="info"
  message="Info Text"
  description="Detailed info description"
  show-icon
></mx-alert>

<!-- Closable -->
<mx-alert
  type="warning"
  message="Warning"
  closable
></mx-alert>

<!-- Banner mode -->
<mx-alert
  type="error"
  message="Error"
  banner
></mx-alert>

mx-anchor-link.name: Anchor
mx-anchor-link.description: Anchor link component for individual navigation items.

properties.name: active
properties.description: Whether this link is currently active

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<mx-anchor-link href="#section1" label="Section 1"></mx-anchor-link>
<mx-anchor-link href="#section2" label="Section 2">
  <mx-anchor-link href="#section2-1" label="Sub Section 2.1"></mx-anchor-link>
</mx-anchor-link>

mx-anchor.name: Anchor
mx-anchor.description: Anchor component for navigation between page sections.

properties.name: target-offset
properties.description: Offset from top when scrolling to target (px)

properties.name: direction
properties.description: Direction of anchor links: vertical, horizontal

properties.name: affix
properties.description: Whether to fix the anchor when scrolling

mx-app.name: App
mx-app.description: App wrapper component for providing application-level configuration.

mx-auto-complete.name: Auto Complete
mx-auto-complete.description: AutoComplete component for input with suggestions.

mx-avatar.name: Avatar
mx-avatar.description: Avatar component for displaying user profile pictures or icons.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Size: large (40px), default (32px), small (24px), or number

properties.name: gap
properties.description: Gap between text and border (for text avatars)

events.name: error
events.description: Dispatched when image fails to load

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<!-- Image avatar -->
<mx-avatar src="user.jpg" alt="User"></mx-avatar>

<!-- Text avatar -->
<mx-avatar>JD</mx-avatar>

<!-- Icon avatar -->
<mx-avatar icon="user"></mx-avatar>

<!-- Different sizes -->
<mx-avatar size="large" src="user.jpg"></mx-avatar>
<mx-avatar size="64" src="user.jpg"></mx-avatar>

<!-- Square shape -->
<mx-avatar shape="square" src="user.jpg"></mx-avatar>

mx-back-top.name: Back Top
mx-back-top.description: Back to top button that scrolls to top when clicked.

slots.description: Custom button content (default: up arrow icon)

mx-badge.name: Badge
mx-badge.description: Badge component for displaying status or count.

properties.name: dot
properties.description: Whether to show a dot instead of count

properties.name: overflow-count
properties.description: Max count to show (shows count+ when exceeded)

properties.name: show-zero
properties.description: Whether to show badge when count is zero

properties.name: status
properties.description: Status type: success, processing, default, error, warning

properties.name: text
properties.description: Text to display next to status dot

slots.description: Wrapped element to attach badge to

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<!-- Count badge -->
<mx-badge count="5">
  <button>Notifications</button>
</mx-badge>

<!-- Dot badge -->
<mx-badge dot>
  <mx-icon name="notification"></mx-icon>
</mx-badge>

<!-- Status badge -->
<mx-badge status="success" text="Success"></mx-badge>

<!-- Overflow -->
<mx-badge count="100" overflow-count="99">
  <button>Messages</button>
</mx-badge>

events.name: click
events.description: Dispatched when the item is clicked

mx-breadcrumb.name: Breadcrumb
mx-breadcrumb.description: Breadcrumb component - Display the current page path

properties.name: type
properties.description: Button type: default, primary, dashed, text, link

properties.name: variant
properties.description: Button variant: outlined, solid, dashed, filled, text, link

properties.name: block
properties.description: Fit button width to its parent width

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<!-- Primary button -->
<mx-button type="primary">Primary</mx-button>

<!-- Button with icon -->
<mx-button>
  <mx-icon slot="icon" svg="..."></mx-icon>
  Button with Icon
</mx-button>

<!-- Loading button -->
<mx-button loading>Loading</mx-button>

<!-- Danger button -->
<mx-button danger type="primary">Delete</mx-button>

<!-- Link button -->
<mx-button type="link" href="https://example.com">Link</mx-button>

mx-card.name: Card
mx-card.description: Card component for displaying content in a container.

properties.name: hoverable
properties.description: Whether card is hoverable with lift effect

properties.name: loading
properties.description: Whether card is in loading state

slots.name: extra
slots.description: Extra content in the header (right side)

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
Card content

Card Title

Card content

Content

 Content

properties.name: indeterminate
properties.description: Whether checkbox is in indeterminate state

properties.name: collapsible
properties.description: Whether panel can be collapsed: header, disabled

properties.name: expand-icon-position
properties.description: Position of expand icon: start, end

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<mx-collapse-panel key="1" header="Panel Title">
  Panel content here
</mx-collapse-panel>

mx-collapse.name: Collapse
mx-collapse.description: Collapse container component for accordion panels.

properties.name: active-key
properties.description: Currently active panel key(s), comma-separated for multiple

properties.name: accordion
properties.description: Accordion mode (only one panel open at a time)

properties.name: expand-icon-position
properties.description: Position of expand icon: start, end

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<mx-collapse>
  <mx-collapse-panel key="1" header="Panel 1">Content 1</mx-collapse-panel>
  <mx-collapse-panel key="2" header="Panel 2">Content 2</mx-collapse-panel>
</mx-collapse>

<!-- Accordion mode -->
<mx-collapse accordion active-key="1">
  <mx-collapse-panel key="1" header="Panel 1">Content 1</mx-collapse-panel>
  <mx-collapse-panel key="2" header="Panel 2">Content 2</mx-collapse-panel>
</mx-collapse>

mx-color-picker.name: Color Picker
mx-color-picker.description: Color picker component for selecting colors.

mx-date-picker.name: Date Picker
mx-date-picker.description: DatePicker component - Date selection input with calendar.

properties.name: picker
properties.description: Picker mode: date, week, month, quarter, year

events.name: ok
events.description: Fired when OK button is clicked

mx-descriptions.name: Descriptions
mx-descriptions.description: Descriptions container component for displaying read-only data.

properties.name: colon
properties.description: Whether to show colon after label

mx-divider.name: Divider
mx-divider.description: Divider component - A divider line separates different content

slots.description: Content to display within the divider (for horizontal dividers with text)

mx-drawer.name: Drawer
mx-drawer.description: Drawer component for panel that slides out from edge of screen.

mx-dropdown.name: Dropdown
mx-dropdown.description: Dropdown component for displaying a menu.

mx-empty.name: Empty
mx-empty.description: Empty state component for displaying when there's no data.

slots.description: Content to display in the flex container

mx-float-button.name: Float Button
mx-float-button.description: Float button component for floating action buttons.

mx-form-item.name: Form
mx-form-item.description: Form Item component - Form field wrapper with label and validation

mx-form.name: Form
mx-form.description: Form component - Form container with validation

slots.description: Content to display in the column

mx-icon.name: Icon
mx-icon.description: Icon component for displaying SVG icons.

slots.description: Default slot for icon content (if svg prop not provided)

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<!-- Using svg prop -->
<mx-icon svg="<svg>...</svg>"></mx-icon>

<!-- Spinning icon -->
<mx-icon spin svg="<svg>...</svg>"></mx-icon>

<!-- Rotated icon -->
<mx-icon rotate="90" svg="<svg>...</svg>"></mx-icon>

<!-- Using slot -->
<mx-icon>
  <svg>...</svg>
</mx-icon>

mx-image.name: Image
mx-image.description: Image component with preview and loading states.

properties.name: fit
properties.description: How image should be resized: fill, contain, cover, none, scale-down

properties.name: preview
properties.description: Whether to enable image preview on click

events.name: error
events.description: Fired when image fails to load

mx-input-password.name: Input
mx-input-password.description: Password input component with visibility toggle.

mx-input-textarea.name: Input
mx-input-textarea.description: TextArea component for multi-line text entry.

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<mx-input-textarea placeholder="Enter text" rows="4"></mx-input-textarea>
<mx-input-textarea auto-size show-count max-length="200"></mx-input-textarea>

properties.name: variant
properties.description: Input variant: outlined, filled, borderless, underlined

events.name: pressenter
events.description: Fired when Enter key is pressed

events.name: clear
events.description: Fired when clear button is clicked

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code: .com

mx-input-number.name: Input Number
mx-input-number.description: InputNumber component for numeric input with increment/decrement controls.

properties.name: controls-position
properties.description: Position of controls: right (default) or updown

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code: $ .00

mx-list-item.name: List
mx-list-item.description: List item component for individual list entries.

mx-list.name: List
mx-list.description: List component for displaying a list of items.

properties.name: split
properties.description: Whether to show split line between items

properties.name: size
properties.description: Size of list items: large, default, small

mx-masonry.name: Masonry
mx-masonry.description: Masonry component - Masonry grid layout for dynamic content.

properties.name: column-width
properties.description: Fixed column width (auto-calculates columns if set)

mx-mention.name: Mention
mx-mention.description: Mention component for @ mentions in text input.

events.name: select
events.description: Dispatched when menu item is selected

events.name: open-change
events.description: Dispatched when sub-menu open state changes

mx-sub-menu.name: Menu
mx-sub-menu.description: Sub Menu component - Nested menu container

mx-message.name: Message
mx-message.description: Message component for displaying lightweight global feedback.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Message type: success, info, warning, error, loading

properties.name: duration
properties.description: Auto-close duration in seconds (0 = no auto-close)

mx-notification.name: Notification
mx-notification.description: Notification component for displaying global notification messages.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Notification type: success, info, warning, error

properties.name: duration
properties.description: Auto-close duration in seconds (0 = no auto-close)

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<mx-notification
  open
  type="success"
  message="Success"
  description="Operation completed successfully"
></mx-notification>

mx-pagination.name: Pagination
mx-pagination.description: Pagination component - Navigate through pages of content

events.name: change
events.description: Dispatched when page or pageSize changes

mx-popconfirm.name: Popconfirm
mx-popconfirm.description: Popconfirm component - A simple confirmation dialog that appears on hover/click.

properties.name: ok-type
properties.description: Button type for confirm: default, primary, danger

events.name: confirm
events.description: Fired when confirm button is clicked

events.name: cancel
events.description: Fired when cancel button is clicked

mx-popover.name: Popover
mx-popover.description: Popover component for displaying rich content in a popup.

mx-progress.name: Progress
mx-progress.description: Progress component for displaying progress of an operation.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Progress status: success, exception, normal, active

properties.name: gap-position
properties.description: Gap position for dashboard: top, bottom, left, right

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<!-- Line progress -->
<mx-progress percent="50"></mx-progress>

<!-- Circle progress -->
<mx-progress type="circle" percent="75"></mx-progress>

<!-- Dashboard -->
<mx-progress type="dashboard" percent="80"></mx-progress>

<!-- Success state -->
<mx-progress percent="100" status="success"></mx-progress>

<!-- Custom color -->
<mx-progress percent="60" stroke-color="#52c41a"></mx-progress>

mx-qr-code.name: Qr Code
mx-qr-code.description: QR Code component for generating QR codes.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Value to encode in QR code

properties.name: size
properties.description: Size of QR code in pixels (default 160)

properties.name: error-level
properties.description: Error correction level: L, M, Q, H

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<mx-radio name="group1" value="1">Option 1</mx-radio>
<mx-radio name="group1" value="2">Option 2</mx-radio>
<mx-radio name="group1" value="3" checked>Option 3</mx-radio>
<mx-radio name="group1" value="4" disabled>Disabled</mx-radio>

mx-result.name: Result
mx-result.description: Result component for displaying operation results.

mx-segmented.name: Segmented
mx-segmented.description: Segmented control component for selecting between options.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Size of the control: large, default, small

mx-select.name: Select
mx-select.description: Select component - Dropdown select with search

properties.name: loading
properties.description: Whether to show skeleton (when false, shows children)

slots.description: Content to show when loading is false

mx-slider.name: Slider
mx-slider.description: Slider component - Range slider for selecting values

mx-spin.name: Spin
mx-spin.description: Spinner component for displaying loading state.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Size of spinner: small, default, large

properties.name: tip
properties.description: Tip text to show below spinner

properties.name: delay
properties.description: Delay in milliseconds before showing spinner

slots.description: Content to wrap (shows spinner overlay when spinning)

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code: Your content here

mx-splitter.name: Splitter
mx-splitter.description: Splitter component - Resizable split pane layout.

properties.name: split-size
properties.description: Size of the split bar in pixels

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
Left Panel
Right Panel
Top Panel

mx-statistic.name: Statistic
mx-statistic.description: Statistic component for displaying statistical data.

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<mx-statistic title="Active Users" value="1234"></mx-statistic>
<mx-statistic title="Growth" value="50.52" suffix="%"></mx-statistic>

properties.name: status
properties.description: Step status: wait, process, finish, error

mx-steps.name: Steps
mx-steps.description: Steps container component for step-by-step navigation.

properties.name: progress-dot
properties.description: Show progress as dots instead of numbers

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<mx-switch></mx-switch>
<mx-switch checked></mx-switch>
<mx-switch disabled></mx-switch>
<mx-switch loading></mx-switch>
<mx-switch size="small"></mx-switch>
<mx-switch checked-children="ON" un-checked-children="OFF"></mx-switch>

mx-tab-pane.name: Tabs
mx-tab-pane.description: Tab Pane component - Individual tab content

slots.description: Content to display when tab is active

events.name: edit
events.description: Dispatched when add/remove tab in editable mode

mx-tag.name: Tag
mx-tag.description: Tag component for categorization or markup.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Predefined color or custom hex color

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<!-- Basic tag -->
<mx-tag>Tag</mx-tag>

<!-- Colored tags -->
<mx-tag color="success">Success</mx-tag>
<mx-tag color="error">Error</mx-tag>

<!-- Closable -->
<mx-tag closable>Closable</mx-tag>

<!-- Custom color -->
<mx-tag color="#87d068">Custom</mx-tag>

<!-- Borderless -->
<mx-tag color="processing" bordered="false">Processing</mx-tag>

mx-theme.name: Theme
mx-theme.description: Theme provider component that generates and provides design tokens to all descendant Meridian components.

properties.name: primary-color
properties.description: Primary brand color (hex). Default: #1677ff (Ant Design blue)

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<!-- Default theme -->
<mx-theme>
  <mx-button>Click me</mx-button>
</mx-theme>

<!-- Custom primary color -->
<mx-theme primary-color="#52c41a">
  <mx-button>Click me</mx-button>
</mx-theme>

events.name: ok
events.description: Fired when OK button is clicked

mx-timeline-item.name: Timeline
mx-timeline-item.description: Timeline item component for individual timeline events.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Color of the timeline dot: blue, red, green, gray

properties.name: position
properties.description: Position in alternate mode: left, right

mx-timeline.name: Timeline
mx-timeline.description: Timeline component for displaying event sequences.

properties.name: mode
properties.description: Position of timeline content: left, right, alternate

properties.name: pending
properties.description: Whether to show pending state at the end

mx-tooltip.name: Tooltip
mx-tooltip.description: Tooltip component for displaying helpful text on hover/focus/click.

properties.name: placement
properties.description: Position of tooltip relative to target

properties.name: trigger
properties.description: How tooltip is triggered: hover, focus, click

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<!-- Basic tooltip -->
<mx-tooltip title="Tooltip text">
  <button>Hover me</button>
</mx-tooltip>

<!-- Different placements -->
<mx-tooltip title="Top" placement="top">
  <button>Top</button>
</mx-tooltip>

<!-- Click trigger -->
<mx-tooltip title="Click to show" trigger="click">
  <button>Click me</button>
</mx-tooltip>

<!-- Custom color -->
<mx-tooltip title="Custom" color="#f50">
  <button>Red tooltip</button>
</mx-tooltip>

mx-typography.name: Typography
mx-typography.description: Typography component for text and headings with semantic styling.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Semantic type: secondary, success, warning, danger

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<!-- Title variants -->
<mx-typography variant="title" level="1">H1 Title</mx-typography>
<mx-typography variant="title" level="2">H2 Title</mx-typography>

<!-- Text with semantic types -->
<mx-typography type="secondary">Secondary text</mx-typography>
<mx-typography type="success">Success text</mx-typography>
<mx-typography type="warning">Warning text</mx-typography>
<mx-typography type="danger">Danger text</mx-typography>

<!-- Modifiers -->
<mx-typography strong>Bold text</mx-typography>
<mx-typography italic>Italic text</mx-typography>
<mx-typography underline>Underlined text</mx-typography>
<mx-typography delete>Deleted text</mx-typography>
<mx-typography code>Code text</mx-typography>
<mx-typography mark>Marked text</mx-typography>
<mx-typography keyboard>Ctrl + C</mx-typography>

<!-- Paragraph -->
<mx-typography variant="paragraph">
  This is a paragraph of text.
</mx-typography>

mx-upload.name: Upload
mx-upload.description: Upload component - File upload with drag-drop

mx-watermark.name: Watermark
mx-watermark.description: Watermark component that adds watermark overlay to content.
